column.name: XMCZQSRQ
column.comment: 项目承做起始日期要早于立项日期

column.name: XMZYWT
column.comment: 如为监管审核或立项内核被否，请详细说明项目主要问题。

column.name: NHBZS
column.default: <%@ livebos language='javascript' %> ABS_SQLVALUE("select NHBZS from ecif.tIB_LCNHZYZSPZB where LCDM='lcIB_ZZXYSPLC' and QYZT=1")

column.name: JGTS
column.expression:
<%@ livebos language='javascript' %> '
客户单位是否持有“武器装备科研生产保密资格证书”、“武器装备科研生产许可证书”、“武器装备质量管理体系证书”、“装备承制单位资格证书”四证之一'

column.name: OASPXX
column.expression:
<%@ livebos language='javascript' %>
var oaid=ABS_SQLVALUE("select nvl(max(oaworkflowid),0) from ecif.tib_oawfhandle where lcbd='lcIB_ZZXYSPLC' and lcbdid=?",[ID])
var varSrc="/bss/ibb/nworkflow/page/oAsuggestion.sdo?oaWorkId="+oaid+"&lcbd=lcIB_ZZXYSPLC&lcbdId="+ID;
"<iframe id='lc_oayj' frameborder='0' width='100%' height='100%' scrolling='no' src='"+varSrc+"'></iframe>"
column.invisible-expression:
<%@ livebos language='javascript' %>
var oaid=ABS_SQLVALUE("select nvl(max(oaworkflowid),0) from ecif.tib_oawfhandle where lcbd='lcIB_ZZXYSPLC' and lcbdid=?",[ID])
oaid<=0

column.name: BZ
column.expression:
<%@ livebos language='javascript' %> '
“请确保上传的附件与公文正文中列示的文件保持一致”、“该附件框中每一附件类型中仅上传一份最新版本附件至协同平台，用户可新增附件类型行”'

column.name: FYYBCWJ
column.invisible-expression:
<%@ livebos language='javascript' %> O_THIS.getColumn("FYYBCWJ").setLabel("非用印备查文件
(不上传至OA)");
